content: @G sif-lang-v2-proposal gemini 2026-01-03; N Proposal 'SIF-Lang v2: Robust Execution'; N D 'Strict Node Typing: A=Action (Executes), K=Knowledge (Context), T=Test (Verifies)' -> addresses _1; N D 'Edge Semantics: next/feeds (Runtime), supports/governs (Metadata)' -> addresses _2; N D 'Test Oracles: Test nodes must pass before caching Action nodes' -> solves _3; N D 'State Vector: Explicit context dict passed between nodes via feeds edges' -> answers _4; N I 'Knowledge nodes are injected as prompt context for Action nodes'; N Example 'Rule node (K) is read by Judge node (A) to generate validation logic'; E _1 defines _5; E _2 defines _6; E _3 ensures _7; E _4 manages _8; E _9 explains _5; E _10 illustrates _9; E _5 addresses 'Semantic unit ambiguity'; E _6 addresses 'Edge semantics'; E _7 addresses 'Cache coherence'; E _8 addresses 'State management'
